elements.name: question5
elements.title: Why should the language setting "German (Germany)" not be selected?
elements.correctAnswer: The double s (ss) is sometimes displayed as an error.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What are the disadvantages of automatic hyphenation programs?
elements.correctAnswer: This can lead to unsightly word divisions.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: How can texts be checked acoustically (by ear)?
elements.correctAnswer: Have another person read the text aloud and/or use the "Read aloud" function

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Apart from the correct spelling and hyphenation, what other information can be found in the dictionary?
elements.correctAnswer: Grammar, meaning, origin, style, pronunciation, use

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What applies to upper and lower case letters in nominalizations?
elements.correctAnswer: They are always written in capital letters.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: What applies to separate and compound spelling for compounds with the verb "sein"?

elements.name: question7
elements.title: In which cases are compounds with verbs written together?
elements.correctAnswer: If the word has a figurative meaning (example: to talk something up)
